help_step.name: tour_0
help_step.text:
HOW TO CREATE INVOICE TEMPLATE SET


STEP 1 - CREATE INVOICE TEMPLATE SET
  • Provide data for the fields displayed on the screen. Then click on the Next button.
STEP 2 - CREATE INVOICE TEMPLATE LEVEL (INITIAL INVOICE)
  • Provide data for the fields displayed on the screen. Then click on the Next button.
STEP 3 - CREATE INVOICE TEMPLATE LEVEL (INTEREST ADMIN)
  • Provide data for the fields displayed on the screen. Then click on the Submit button.
